rules.name: TRUE_myRule_1
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6) AND (7 OR 8) AND 9 AND (10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23) AND 24
rules.label: TRUE_Create Opportunity (VILT Public)

rules.name: TRUE_myRule_13
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND (6 OR 7) AND (8 OR 9) AND 10 AND (11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19) AND 20
rules.label: TRUE_Product Order (VILT TTT/PCAI)

rules.name: TRUE_myRule_7
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7) AND 8 AND (9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23) AND 24
rules.label: TRUE_Product Order (VILT Onsite)

Flow.description: Migrated from the Create an Opportunity from an ATC (Canada) process using multiple criteria. This process will automatically create an opportunity for a VILT ATC that gets materials mailed to individuals for Public, Onsite & TTT Orders

formulas.name: formula_11_myRule_13_A1_7573881670
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS( {!$Record.Contact__r.OtherStreet} , SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) ) , TRIM( MID( {!$Record.Contact__r.OtherStreet} , FIND( SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) , {!$Record.Contact__r.OtherStreet} ), LEN( {!$Record.Contact__r.OtherStreet} ) ) ) , "" )

formulas.name: formula_12_myRule_13_A1_6523862159
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS( {!$Record.Contact__r.OtherStreet} , SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) ) , LEFT( {!$Record.Contact__r.OtherStreet} , FIND( SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) , {!$Record.Contact__r.OtherStreet} ) - 1 ) , {!$Record.Contact__r.OtherStreet} )
